title: Insolvency cases over Rs 1000 cr hold 90% of recoverable value despite representing just 15% of total cases
description: Research showed that while just 15% of insolvency cases have claims over Rs 1,000 crore, they make up 90% of recoverable value. Specialized tribunals are being recommended to expedite high-value cases, and Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman proposed new NCLT benches to tackle these concerns and improve resolution times.
